title: Game keeps lagging, dc'ing & freezing
body: The game randomly lags & dc's, nothing else dc's though it's JUST League. Do I need to re-isntall or something?

replies.body: A reinstall might help if there are damaged game files somewhere, but most likely those dc's can be fixed by making a few small adjustments to your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Definitely hit us back if that doesn't seem to be helping too much, and we can take a much closer look.
I did re-install, didn't help the freezing much, though the dc'ing has stopped.

It's good that those network changes were able to clear up some of those dc's, but let's dig a little deeper to see if we can iron out those freezes too. 

Depending on where your game is freezing will decide on how we tackle this kind of thing, so hit me back with how/when the game is freezing to make sure we take the right steps!
Well, the game freezes randomly whenever it feels like it. Mostly when I start a trade with my laner, or start a team fight. I can send my specs if that helps.

If it's not happening at any particular time, my best suggestion would be to do a repair through the game client options. If you'd like to go ahead and shoot our tech guys a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they'll be able to look over your specs and logs to see what's all going on in the back!

Did a repair already didn't help.

Although, I think I did figure it out during my last game. Running any recording software (OpenBroadcastSoftware in my case) lags me hard, which...never happened before. I guess I can't Stream anymore then, ah well.

Ahhhhhhh yep, I'm guessing the main issue was that your pc may have been getting bogged down by trying to run League on top of recording video, as well as uploading the stream in real time to your streaming service. It's quite a lot to do all at once, so I'd try running League without any other programs running in the background to see if that smooths things out!

It DID smooth things out, mostly. I still get some freeze, & some dc though. But it never really caused an issue for me before the past few days & I used to be able to Stream League without it bogging down by pc. All of a sudden it's an issue, guess it happens & I should just move on without recording the game.

This issue just refuses to let me fix it! And I'd feel better about this if everything worked correctly AND you could still stream! 

Since I've about exhausted the usual steps that seem to fix things like this, let's get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they'll be able to take a much closer look than I can hear on the boards.
I will send a ticket with my specs there. I'm beginning to think it is a League issue, as I've done so much to fix it but it still persists. Thanks for trying to help though.
